item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1627; 09:08PM; 13305 W Arminta St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f6dEyv; #SunValley; 46 Firefighters took just 30 minutes to extinguish heavy fire in a 2,147 square-foot one-story home. All four occupants exited the structure safely prior to LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E289 E290 E39 E77 EM14 RA39 RA889 T39 T60 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1151; 03:47PM; 17700 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f85MwA; #Reseda; PRELIM: Traffic collision with entrapment of at least one patient (and another pedestrian injured?). No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2326); FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E290 EM15 RA100 RA73 RA881 T90; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

#Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1120; 03:45PM; 1605 S Canfield Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GeUN04; #Beverlywood; Address corrected from 1606 S Canfield Avenue and neighborhood name to adjacent 'Beverlywood'. First arriving 24 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to confine flames to a detached structure in the rear yard, now described as a pool house conversion. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E58 E59 E71 RA58 T92; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1120; 03:29PM; 1606 S Canfield Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HLr53e; #PicoRobertson; PRELIM: Detached garage (conversion?) well involved with fire; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E58 E59 E71 RA58 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Aircraft Down; INC#0965; 02:30PM; 10130 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HRYOIb; #Pacoima; The pilot (unknown age / gender / injuries/ condition / affiliation / circumstances) has been transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. No fire. Minor fuel spill has been contained by firefighters. No other injuries reported. The damaged airplane remains on or near Metrolink Antelope Valley line train tracks. All train movement is currently restricted in that area. No further details. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of San Fernando Road and/or Osborne Street in the immediate area until on-site emergency / investigative operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Train Riders: Follow @MetrolinkAV https://twitter.com/MetrolinkAV on Twitter for any service related information. Media Inquiries: NTSB / FAA; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E7 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA898 RA98 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Aircraft Down; INC#0965; 02:09PM; 10130 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HRYOIb; #Pacoima; PRELIM: Small single engine airplane down on or near train tracks adjacent to Whiteman Airport. Sole occupant = pilot, pulled from aircraft by bystanders prior to LAFD arrival, now being medically evaluated by LAFD responders. No further details. Media Inquiries: NTSB / FAA; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E7 EM17 RA898 RA98 T75 UR88; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0269; 04:55AM; 1022 W 84th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7wAbl; #VermontKnolls; 29 Firefighters took just 24 minutes in well-coordinated defensive operations, to extinguish (5:19 AM) fire in a vacant 1 story home, the site of a previous blaze. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 RA257 T33 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/07/2022 INC#1874

item.description: Knockdown - #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1874; 11:21PM; 6150 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r20MPF; #NorthHollywood; 79 LAFD Firefighters took just 43 minutes in well-coordinated defensive operations to confine heavy fire within a 50' x 100' vacant and boarded one-story commercial building among a row of mostly vacant buildings. No injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation. Media: LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E60 E76 E77 E81 E89 EA1 EM11 EM14 HE1 RA102 RA60 RA889 RA89 RS3 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #LaurelCanyonFire - 01/07/2022 INC#1874

item.description: Update #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1874; 11:06PM; 6150 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r20MPF; #NorthHollywood; Defensive firefighting operations continue, as firefighters seek to confine the fire to the well involved 50' x 100' (apparently vacant and) boarded one-story building among a row of mostly vacant buildings. No injuries reported. Media: LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is en route, ETA 11:30 PM. #LATraffic: One or more lanes of Laurel Canyon Boulevard in the immediate area of the fire are expected to be closed until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E60 E76 E77 E81 E89 EM11 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey
